nodes.text: The Skirmish on Demonsgate was a small-scale engagement fought between a landing party from the New Republic CR90 corvette FarStar, and Stormtroopers from Moff Sarne's forces under the command of the bounty hunter Mist. Fought on the planet Demonsgate on the edge of the Kathol Rift, the battle ended when Aing-Tii monks attacked the Imperial forces in an attempt to secure the FarStar's navigator, Makezh, who was carrying their sacred Codex.
